text:
[Unfilled parameters will need a real time webhook response]

Departure Flight $session.params.departure_flight_number
Date $session.params.departure_date
Departure Airport $session.params.departure_airport
Time $session.params.outbound_departure_time
Arrival Airport $session.params.return_airport  
Time $session.params.outbound_arrival_time 

Return Flight $session.params.return_flight_number
Date $session.params.return_date
Departure Airport $session.params.return_airport  
Time $session.params.return_departure_time
Arrival Airport $session.params.departure_airport
Time $session.params.return_arrival_time

The price for this ticket is $session.params.ticket_price
You have an available account credit of: $session.params.account_credit 

Would you like to proceed with payment?
